Content.Text:
<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm glad you came, <MYNAME>!
Would you like to try playing the tune
<RED>"Friends on the Farm"</RED>?
Play
Don't play

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay!
Just hit the notes I tell you in order
with your hammer!
<PAGE>
The tune for <RED>Friends on the Farm</RED> is:
<PINK>Ti</PINK> <PURPLE>Do</PURPLE> <ORANGE>Re</ORANGE> <PINK>Ti</PINK> <BLUE>La</BLUE> <PINK>Ti</PINK>
<PURPLE>Do</PURPLE> <BLUE>La</BLUE> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <PINK>Ti</PINK> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww! If you decide you want to play it
some time, come see me!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up?
Ready to stop playing?
Tell me the tune again
Quit playing

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, I'll tell you again!
Just hit the notes I tell you in order
with your hammer!
<PAGE>
The tune for <RED>Friends on the Farm</RED> is:
<PINK>Ti</PINK> <PURPLE>Do</PURPLE> <ORANGE>Re</ORANGE> <PINK>Ti</PINK> <BLUE>La</BLUE> <PINK>Ti</PINK>
<PURPLE>Do</PURPLE> <BLUE>La</BLUE> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <PINK>Ti</PINK> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww! If you decide you want to play it
some time, come see me!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Play faster!
Don't be such a slowpoke!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up?
Do you want to quit playing?
Continue playing
Quit playing

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now I want you to play faster!
Just hit the notes I tell you in order
with your hammer!
<PAGE>
The tune for <RED>Friends on the Farm</RED> is:
<PINK>Ti</PINK> <PURPLE>Do</PURPLE> <ORANGE>Re</ORANGE> <PINK>Ti</PINK> <BLUE>La</BLUE> <PINK>Ti</PINK>
<PURPLE>Do</PURPLE> <BLUE>La</BLUE> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <PINK>Ti</PINK> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww! If you decide you want to play it
some time, come see me!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You played it wrong!
Come on, try it again from the top!
Try playing again
Quit playing

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come on, concentrate!
<PAGE>
The tune for <RED>Friends on the Farm</RED> is:
<PINK>Ti</PINK> <PURPLE>Do</PURPLE> <ORANGE>Re</ORANGE> <PINK>Ti</PINK> <BLUE>La</BLUE> <PINK>Ti</PINK>
<PURPLE>Do</PURPLE> <BLUE>La</BLUE> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <PINK>Ti</PINK> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww! If you decide you want to play it
some time, come see me!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee-hee-hee-hee.
You hit the right notes!
Great performance!
<PAGE>
So we're going to give you a prize!
Go ahead, Aaron!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Right!
<PAGE>
This time your prize is a very valuable
item!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here it is!
Take it!

<SPEED_IMME>
You acquired a <GREEN>pink diamond</GREEN>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks for playing tunes for us!
Keep it up, okay?

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'll let you know when I think of a new
tune.
I'm sure you'll be waiting eagerly!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You don't have any room in your bag!
How can I give you your prize?
Open <BLUE>one</BLUE> slot, okay!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since your bag is full, I'll put the
diamond in your <BLUE>storage</BLUE>, okay?
You can go check it out there later!

You acquired a <GREEN>pink diamond</GREEN>!
Go to your <BLUE>storage</BLUE> later on
and check it out!
